definition: lacking honor or integrity, refuse to accept
details:
noun
- lacking honor or integrity
= synonyms: dishonourable
- a state of shame or disgrace
= example: a state of shame or disgrace
= synonyms: dishonour
verb
- refuse to accept
= example: refuse to accept
= synonyms: dishonour, reject, decline, refuse, turn down, pass up
- bring shame or dishonor upon
= example: bring shame or dishonor upon
= synonyms: dishonour, shame, disgrace, attaint
- force (someone) to have sex against their will
= synonyms: outrage
